name: Jot It Down
description: A scheduling application for clients and providers. Secure login and authentication with JWT. Create and schedule services!.

name: RP Lite
description: Login to challenge friends to a fun rock-paper-scissors type game. Live updates with Socket.IO. Level up your creatures when you win!

name: QuickByte
description: Select a type of restaurant to generate random restaraunts nearby based on your long-lat!

name: Schedule It
description: A simple scheduling application that will tell you if your appointments are coming up, have passed or are currently going on.

name: Apex Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather application that shows current weather and 5 day weather forecast for any location!

name: Super Quiz Time
alt: image of Super Quiz Time application
description: A very simple quiz game about some very basic web dev trivia.
